## AbstractDIDCommTransport.isServiceSupported() method

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.

Returns `true` if this transport is suitable for the provided DID Document service section, otherwise `false`.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
abstract isServiceSupported(service: any): boolean;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Description                      |
| --------- | ---- | -------------------------------- |
| service   | any  | The DID Document service section |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean
